generic.name: Name of Generic Statblock

sections.name: Category
sections.entry: Example categories include Spell, Creature, Item, the list could go on...

sections.name: Level
sections.entry: Supports string/integer values. Strings are not rendered with a space between category and level.

sections.name: Sections
sections.entry: Are separated by a dividing line. Each section contains arrays, the contents of those arrays are rendered in the same block.

sections.name: Like This
sections.entry: Examples from the book include Range & Targets in spells.

sections: If a section's array contains only strings, it is rendered as entry text.
